title: Redis
description: Monitor redis with metrics and logs

metrics.name: redis_commands_processed
metrics.description: Total number of commands processed by the server

metrics.name: redis_cpu_time
metrics.description: System CPU consumed by the Redis server in seconds since server start

metrics.name: redis_keys_expired
metrics.description: Total number of key expiration events

metrics.name: redis_db_expires
metrics.description: Number of keyspace keys with an expiration

metrics.name: redis_commands
metrics.description: Number of commands processed per second

metrics.name: redis_replication_offset
metrics.description: The server's current replication offset

metrics.name: redis_net_input
metrics.description: The total number of bytes read from the network

metrics.name: redis_clients_connected
metrics.description: Number of client connections (excluding connections from replicas)

metrics.name: redis_keys_evicted
metrics.description: Number of evicted keys due to maxmemory limit

metrics.name: redis_maxmemory
metrics.description: The value of the maxmemory configuration directive

metrics.name: redis_clients_max_input_buffer
metrics.description: Biggest input buffer among current client connections

metrics.name: redis_cmd_latency
metrics.description: Command execution latency

metrics.name: redis_memory_lua
metrics.description: Number of bytes used by the Lua engine

metrics.name: redis_replication_backlog_first_byte_offset
metrics.description: The master offset of the replication backlog buffer

metrics.name: redis_keyspace_hits
metrics.description: Number of successful lookup of keys in the main dictionary

metrics.name: redis_clients_blocked
metrics.description: Number of clients pending on a blocking call

metrics.name: redis_connections_rejected
metrics.description: Number of connections rejected because of maxclients limit

metrics.name: redis_latest_fork
metrics.description: Duration of the latest fork operation in microseconds

metrics.name: redis_clients_max_output_buffer
metrics.description: Longest output list among current client connections

metrics.name: redis_slaves_connected
metrics.description: Number of connected replicas

metrics.name: redis_db_keys
metrics.description: Number of keyspace keys

metrics.name: redis_keyspace_misses
metrics.description: Number of failed lookup of keys in the main dictionary

metrics.name: redis_uptime
metrics.description: Number of seconds since Redis server start

metrics.name: redis_memory_used
metrics.description: Total number of bytes allocated by Redis using its allocator

metrics.name: redis_net_output
metrics.description: The total number of bytes written to the network

metrics.name: redis_connections_received
metrics.description: Total number of connections accepted by the server

metrics.name: redis_rdb_changes_since_last_save
metrics.description: Number of changes since the last dump

metrics.name: redis_memory_rss
metrics.description: Number of bytes that Redis allocated as seen by the operating system

metrics.name: redis_db_avg_ttl
metrics.description: Average keyspace keys TTL

metrics.name: redis_memory_peak
metrics.description: Peak memory consumed by Redis (in bytes)

metrics.name: redis_memory_fragmentation_ratio
metrics.description: Ratio between used_memory_rss and used_memory
